name: 小钢炮大冒险 Hot Hatch Adventure
name_original: 小钢炮大冒险 Hot Hatch Adventure
description:
Story

This is a story about a rally racing car crossing into a different world and experiencing various thrilling adventures.
Here, you'll utilize your exceptional driving skills to solve various problems for the inhabitants of this different world. Help goblins with speedy deliveries, assist goblins in finding lost goats, rescue dwarves amidst volcanic eruptions, and more.

How to play?

Keyboard controls
W : acceleration
S : braking
A : left turn
D : right turn
Spacebar : handbrake

Quick tip:

Engage the handbrake while taking sharp turns, counter-steer, and you'll pull off some impressive drifts.
